content:
Hello,
I was wondering does zulip have standup feature that I can use?
Thank you so much. :)
@jcheng do you just want a bot that posts that it's standup time 1/day? You can do that easily with Zapier or a cron job that calls the zulip-send tool.

Tim Abbott said:

jcheng do you just want a bot that posts that it's standup time 1/day? You can do that easily with Zapier or a cron job that calls the zulip-send tool.

Tim,
Thank you so much for taking the time to reply to my question.
I really appreciate.
Actually, when I say standup, I mean a place where people can post what they want to do each day.
It's like a morning meeting, but you post your to do list on Zulip.
Thank you so much again. :)

@jcheng ahh, for that, just name a stream "standups" and have each person use their name as the topic for their standup posts -- it works great! Some folks in this community do that sort of post in #checkins.
